price: 95.Kaadu Nabiyow nanu diggah digaalák ken kah xagnisnem koo naybulleemih dudda-lino.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
